column4: I just installed Ubuntu 10.04 but when i click my username to log into ubuntu, i get this error -> 'Error Initialising conversation with authorization system - general failure'. I have tried restarting but i still get the error. can i not be ignored this time?
I dont want to be sceptical.. but did you use a clean CD to burn the iso?
i used a USB stick and use the program that it said on ubuntu.com
slidinghorn  gave you an excellent sollution
